dcterms:creator: Marc Meurens
dcterms:description: A dataset containing spectrophotometric samples of orange juice used for estimating sugar concentration through near infrared reflectance spectroscopy. The dataset includes 149 training samples and 67 test samples, with 700 spectral variables representing absorbance between 1100nm and 2500nm. Sugar concentration ranges from 0% to 95.2% by weight.
dcterms:title: Orange Juice Dataset

dcterms:creator: Marc Meurens
dcterms:description: A dataset containing spectrophotometric samples of wine used for estimating alcohol concentration through mid-infrared spectroscopy. The dataset includes 91 training samples and 30 test samples, with 256 spectral variables representing absorbance at wave numbers between 4000 and 400 cmâˆ’1. Alcohol content varies from 7.48% to 15.5% by volume.
dcterms:title: Wine Dataset
